```{r Clean enviroment}
rm(list = ls())
```

```{r Libraries}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r Read data}
Brondata <- read_csv("./Intermediate/Brondata.csv")
```

```{r Subset data}
Afvangsten <- subset(Brondata, Sample_Type == "Afvangst")
```

```{r prep dataframe}
Afvangsten$L00 <- NA
Afvangsten$L0 <- NA
Afvangsten$L1 <- NA
Afvangsten$L2 <- NA
Afvangsten$M1 <- NA
Afvangsten$M2 <- NA
Afvangsten$AM <- NA
Afvangsten$AV <- NA
```
